Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to open and read text files

    0.0.1
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Randall Rowland

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static void clearScreen()
      Clears the screen of previous text, errors, etc.

      Increments the failed login counter and lets user know there was an error logging in.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        main program loop. Loops until 3 failed login attempts or user quits.
        Parameters:
        args - not used

      • logInScreen

        private static void logInScreen()
        Used to display the login screen and collect username/password. Also invokes SAM to compare username/passwords.

      • showUserFile

        private static void showUserFile()
        Uses SAM to validate username/password and display user's file

      • failedLogin

        private static void failedLogin()
        Increments the failed login counter and lets user know there was an error logging in.

      • pressAnyKeyToContinue

        private static void pressAnyKeyToContinue()
        Pauses program execution until the user presses Enter.

      • clearScreen

        private static void clearScreen()
        Clears the screen of previous text, errors, etc.
